Hi

Is it normal that the key expires in every two days or is it just me? Kind of a getting on my nerves already :)

But thanks for the uploads hellboy :)

anterashot! unmark participating in Kaspersky Network it will longer your keys working / set update each 2 days lets, anyway Kaspersky Lab is actively blacklisting lots of keys, including in this torrent
